body_html: Oh I don't mean to disagree, it's just that you need those two extra arrays on the device. I sure know that my CTC PR would look much nicer with a device (or kernel) accessor and you cannot typo the strides, either.
body_text: Oh I don't mean to disagree, it's just that you need those two extra arrays on the device. I sure know that my CTC PR would look much nicer with a device (or kernel) accessor and you cannot typo the strides, either.
body: Oh I don't mean to disagree, it's just that you need those two extra arrays on the device. I sure know that my [CTC PR](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/9628) would look much nicer with a device (or kernel) accessor and you cannot typo the strides, either.
